import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';// Create axios instance
const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,timeout:10000});// Request interceptor to add token
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Response interceptor to handle errors
api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{var _error$response;if(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status)===401){localStorage.removeItem('token');window.location.href='/login';}return Promise.reject(error);});// Auth API
export const authAPI={login:(credentials,userType)=>{const endpoint=userType==='student'?'/auth/login/student':'/auth/login/staff';return api.post(endpoint,credentials);},logout:()=>api.post('/auth/logout'),verifyToken:token=>api.get('/auth/verify',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}),changePassword:passwords=>api.put('/auth/change-password',passwords),getProfile:()=>api.get('/auth/profile')};// Users API
export const usersAPI={getProfile:()=>api.get('/users/profile'),updateProfile:data=>api.put('/users/profile',data)};// Classes API
export const classesAPI={getGrades:()=>api.get('/classes/grades'),getClasses:gradeId=>api.get("/classes/classes".concat(gradeId?"?grade_id=".concat(gradeId):'')),getClassesByGrade:gradeId=>api.get("/classes/grades/".concat(gradeId,"/classes")),getClassStudents:classId=>api.get("/classes/classes/".concat(classId,"/students")),createGrade:data=>api.post('/classes/grades',data),createClass:data=>api.post('/classes/classes',data),updateClass:(id,data)=>api.put("/classes/classes/".concat(id),data),deleteClass:id=>api.delete("/classes/classes/".concat(id))};// Tasks API
export const tasksAPI={getTasks:(gradeId,classId)=>api.get("/tasks/grade/".concat(gradeId,"/class/").concat(classId)),getTask:id=>api.get("/tasks/".concat(id)),createTask:data=>api.post('/tasks',data),updateTask:(id,data)=>api.put("/tasks/".concat(id),data),deleteTask:id=>api.delete("/tasks/".concat(id)),getTaskSubmissions:(id,status)=>api.get("/tasks/".concat(id,"/submissions").concat(status?"?status=".concat(status):''))};// Quizzes API
export const quizzesAPI={createQuiz:data=>api.post('/quizzes',data),getQuiz:taskId=>api.get("/quizzes/".concat(taskId)),submitQuiz:(taskId,answers)=>api.post("/quizzes/".concat(taskId,"/submit"),{answers}),getQuizResults:taskId=>api.get("/quizzes/".concat(taskId,"/results")),deleteQuiz:taskId=>api.delete("/quizzes/".concat(taskId))};// Announcements API
export const announcementsAPI={getAnnouncements:(gradeId,classId)=>api.get("/announcements/grade/".concat(gradeId,"/class/").concat(classId)),getAnnouncement:id=>api.get("/announcements/".concat(id)),createAnnouncement:data=>api.post('/announcements',data),updateAnnouncement:(id,data)=>api.put("/announcements/".concat(id),data),deleteAnnouncement:id=>api.delete("/announcements/".concat(id)),getRecentAnnouncements:limit=>api.get("/announcements/recent/".concat(limit||5))};// Submissions API
export const submissionsAPI={submitAssignment:(taskId,data)=>{const formData=new FormData();if(data.content)formData.append('content',data.content);if(data.file)formData.append('file',data.file);return api.post("/submissions/assignment/".concat(taskId),formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});},getStudentSubmissions:params=>api.get('/submissions/student',{params}),getSubmission:id=>api.get("/submissions/".concat(id)),gradeSubmission:(id,data)=>api.put("/submissions/".concat(id,"/grade"),data),returnSubmission:(id,data)=>api.put("/submissions/".concat(id,"/return"),data),downloadSubmission:id=>api.get("/submissions/".concat(id,"/download"),{responseType:'blob'}),getTaskSubmissions:(taskId,status)=>api.get("/submissions/task/".concat(taskId).concat(status?"?status=".concat(status):''))};// Admin API
export const adminAPI={// Students
addStudent:data=>api.post('/admin/students',data),bulkAddStudents:students=>api.post('/admin/students/bulk',{students}),getStudents:params=>api.get('/admin/students',{params}),updateStudent:(id,data)=>api.put("/admin/students/".concat(id),data),deleteStudent:id=>api.delete("/admin/students/".concat(id)),exportCredentials:params=>api.get('/admin/students/export-credentials',{params,responseType:'blob'}),// Teachers
addTeacher:data=>api.post('/admin/teachers',data),getTeachers:()=>api.get('/admin/teachers'),// Statistics
getStatistics:()=>api.get('/admin/statistics')};export default api;
